errors.name: InvalidInactivityPeriod
errors.msg: Invalid inactivity period. Must be between 24 hours and 300 years

errors.name: InvalidGracePeriod
errors.msg: Invalid grace period. Must be between 24 hours and 90 days

errors.name: MustClaimInheritanceFirst
errors.msg: Must claim inheritance first before claiming tokens

errors.name: InvalidNFTAmount
errors.msg: Invalid NFT amount - must be exactly 1

errors.name: AssetsRemain
errors.msg: Assets remain in estate - withdraw tokens/NFTs before closing

errors.name: TradingNotInitialized
errors.msg: Trading not initialized - must enable trading first

errors.name: RecoveryTooEarly
errors.msg: Recovery can only be initiated after 30 days of being claimable

errors.name: RecoveryNotReady
errors.msg: Recovery time lock not yet expired

errors.name: TradingAlreadyEnabled
errors.msg: Trading already enabled for this estate

errors.name: TradingNotEnabled
errors.msg: Trading not enabled for this estate

errors.name: InvalidProfitShare
errors.msg: Invalid profit share. Human share must be between 50-100%

errors.name: InvalidEmergencyDelay
errors.msg: Invalid emergency delay. Must be between 24 hours and 7 days

errors.name: EmergencyWithdrawalNotReady
errors.msg: Emergency withdrawal delay not yet expired

errors.name: InvalidSignerCount
errors.msg: Invalid number of signers. Must be between 2 and 10

errors.name: InvalidLockReason
errors.msg: Invalid lock reason - must be between 5 and 200 characters

errors.name: InvalidThreshold
errors.msg: Invalid threshold. Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to number of signers

errors.name: DuplicateSigner
errors.msg: Duplicate signer detected in multisig initialization

errors.name: AlreadyApproved
errors.msg: Proposal already approved by this signer

errors.name: MultisigAlreadyAttached
errors.msg: Multisig already attached to this estate

errors.name: InvalidRiskParameter
errors.msg: Invalid risk parameter - values exceed allowed limits

errors.name: InvalidStrategyMix
errors.msg: Invalid strategy mix - allocations must sum to 100%

errors.name: InvalidProposalEstate
errors.msg: Invalid proposal estate - target estate mismatch

errors.name: ProposerNotExecutor
errors.msg: Executor must be the original proposer for this action

errors.name: NotEnoughApprovals
errors.msg: Not enough approvals for this proposal

errors.name: EmergencyLockCooldown
errors.msg: Emergency lock cooldown period not expired

errors.name: UnlockTooEarly
errors.msg: Cannot unlock yet - minimum delay not expired
